reviews.review_msg: The midterm and final were very straightforward. If you pay attention to the notes and understand the lab assignments you will do very well. She is extremely helpful and provides suggestions on your presentation. Great prof!

This is a writing class, so expect an essay due every 2 weeks. Lecture and lab is integrated and both taught by Margaret. If you did good in GEOG317, you should find this class easy. She is very helpful and nice. I really learned how to write scientific paper at the end and I received a higher final grade than I expected

417 is a writing intensive course for physical geog major students. It teaches you how to write proper scientific reports. Khaled was helpful and available for extra help outside of the class (and i learned that he was preparing for his PhD defense during that time)...I think he is a really good instructor
